price: 46.Nabiyow addunyal digaalak ken kah xagnisnaamak tu koo aybullee kee hinnay woh koo aybullee kalah koo warrayse akkenno (raba kinnuk) toysa ama namma caalatal inkih ken caagid nee fan yaduure, tohuk lakal ken taamoomiy usun addunyal abak sugeenil Yalli sumaaqah yaniih ken elle gaițele.
arabic: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā nuriyannaka baʿḍa alladhī naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma al-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā yafʿalūna
